SELECT EXPRT_TYPE_CD , FLD_LCTR_YN , FLD_PLANNG_YN , FLD_CNSLTNG_YN , FLD_ETC_YN , FLD_ETC_CN , MOBLPHON_RLS_YN , TELNO_RLS_YN , EML_RLS_YN , QLFC_RLS_YN , HDOF_RLS_YN , CAREER_RLS_YN , ENT_LCTR_DMND_RCPTN_YN , LCTR_GDNC_RCPTN_YN , ENV_EDU_CAREER_YY , ENV_EDU_CAREER_MM , STTS_CD , APLY_DT , MDFCN_DT , MDFRID , REG_DT , RGTRID , TOS_AGRE_YN , PRVC_CLCT_AGRE_YN , PRVC_THPTY_PVSN_AGRE_YN , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(D.CD_NM) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_SBJCT C INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON C.SBJCT_CD = D.CD WHERE C.USERID = #{user.userid}) AS SBJCT_CD_NM , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(D.CD_NM) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_TRGT C INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON C.TRGT_CD = D.CD WHERE C.USERID = #{user.userid}) AS TRGT_CD_NM , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(D.CD_NM) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_ACTVT_SCOPE C INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON C.RGN_CD = D.CD WHERE C.USERID= #{user.userid}) AS ACTVT_SCOPE_CD_NM , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(D.CD_NM) FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT_ACTVT_RGN C INNER JOIN TB_CMM_CD D ON C.RGN_CD = D.CD WHERE C.USERID = #{user.userid}) AS ACTVT_RGN_CD_NM
FROM TB_ASS_EXPRT WHERE USERID= #{user.userid}
